title: Russia’s musical journeys
itunes:title: Russia’s musical journeys
itunes:subtitle: Sophy Roberts explains how pianos can illuminate the history of Russia, from the tsarist era to Soviet rule. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Sophy Roberts, author of The Lost Pianos of Siberia, explains how the instrument can illuminate the history of Russia, from the tsarist era to the decades of Soviet rule. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
